verses.verse: And Joshua <S%H3091><s%> rose early <S%H7925><s%> in the morning; <S%H1242><s%> and they removed <S%H5265><s%> from Shittim, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7851><s%> and came <S%H935><s%> to <S%H5704><s%> Jordan, <S%H3383><s%> he <S%H1931><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and lodged <S%H3885><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> before <S%H2962><s%> they passed over. <S%H5674><s%>

And it came to pass <S%H1961><s%> after <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7097><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> days, <S%H3117><s%> that the officers <S%H7860><s%> went <S%H5674><s%> through <S%H7130><s%> the host; <S%H4264><s%>

And they commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H853><s%> the people, <S%H5971><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> When ye see <S%H7200><s%> <S%H853><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> and the priests <S%H3548><s%> the Levites <S%H3881><s%> bearing <S%H5375><s%> it, then ye <S%H859><s%> shall remove <S%H5265><s%> from your place, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4725><s%> and go <S%H1980><s%> after <S%H310><s%> it.

Yet <S%H389><s%> there shall be <S%H1961><s%> a space <S%H7350><s%> between <S%H996><s%> you and it, about two thousand <S%H505><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%> by measure: <S%H4060><s%> come not near <S%H408><s%> <S%H7126><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> it, that <S%H4616><s%> <S%H834><s%> ye may know <S%H3045><s%> <S%H853><s%> the way <S%H1870><s%> by which <S%H834><s%> ye must go: <S%H1980><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> ye have not <S%H3808><s%> passed <S%H5674><s%> this way <S%H1870><s%> heretofore. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8543><s%> <S%H8032><s%>

And Joshua <S%H3091><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the people, <S%H5971><s%> Sanctify yourselves: <S%H6942><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> tomorrow <S%H4279><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> will do <S%H6213><s%> wonders <S%H6381><s%> among <S%H7130><s%> you.

And Joshua <S%H3091><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the priests, <S%H3548><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Take up <S%H5375><s%> <S%H853><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant, <S%H1285><s%> and pass over <S%H5674><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the people. <S%H5971><s%> And they took up <S%H5375><s%> <S%H853><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant, <S%H1285><s%> and went <S%H1980><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the people. <S%H5971><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Joshua, <S%H3091><s%> This <S%H2088><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> will I begin <S%H2490><s%> to magnify <S%H1431><s%> thee in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%> that <S%H834><s%> they may know <S%H3045><s%> that, <S%H3588><s%> as <S%H834><s%> I was <S%H1961><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> so I will be <S%H1961><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> thee.

And thou <S%H859><s%> shalt command <S%H6680><s%> <S%H853><s%> the priests <S%H3548><s%> that bear <S%H5375><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant, <S%H1285><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> When ye are come <S%H935><s%> to <S%H5704><s%> the brink <S%H7097><s%> of the water <S%H4325><s%> of Jordan, <S%H3383><s%> ye shall stand still <S%H5975><s%> in Jordan. <S%H3383><s%>

And Joshua <S%H3091><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> Come <S%H5066><s%> hither, <S%H2008><s%> and hear <S%H8085><s%> <S%H853><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God. <S%H430><s%>

And Joshua <S%H3091><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> Hereby <S%H2063><s%> ye shall know <S%H3045><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> the living <S%H2416><s%> God <S%H410><s%> is among <S%H7130><s%> you, and that he will without fail drive out <S%H3423><s%> <S%H3423><s%> from before <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> you <S%H853><s%> the Canaanites, <S%H3669><s%> and the Hittites, <S%H2850><s%> and the Hivites, <S%H2340><s%> and the Perizzites, <S%H6522><s%> and the Girgashites, <S%H1622><s%> and the Amorites, <S%H567><s%> and the Jebusites. <S%H2983><s%>

Behold, <S%H2009><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of the Lord <S%H113><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%> passeth over <S%H5674><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you into Jordan. <S%H3383><s%>

Now <S%H6258><s%> therefore take <S%H3947><s%> you twelve <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240><s%> men <S%H376><s%> out of the tribes <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7626><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> out of every tribe a man. <S%H376><s%> <S%H259><s%> <S%H376><s%> <S%H259><s%> <S%H7626><s%>

And it shall come to pass, <S%H1961><s%> as soon as the soles <S%H3709><s%> of the feet <S%H7272><s%> of the priests <S%H3548><s%> that bear <S%H5375><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> the Lord <S%H113><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> the earth, <S%H776><s%> shall rest <S%H5117><s%> in the waters <S%H4325><s%> of Jordan, <S%H3383><s%> that the waters <S%H4325><s%> of Jordan <S%H3383><s%> shall be cut off <S%H3772><s%> from the waters <S%H4325><s%> that come down <S%H3381><s%> from above; <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4605><s%> and they shall stand <S%H5975><s%> upon a <S%H259><s%> heap. <S%H5067><s%>

And it came to pass, <S%H1961><s%> when the people <S%H5971><s%> removed <S%H5265><s%> from their tents, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H168><s%> to pass over <S%H5674><s%> <S%H853><s%> Jordan, <S%H3383><s%> and the priests <S%H3548><s%> bearing <S%H5375><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the people; <S%H5971><s%>

And as they that bore <S%H5375><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> were come <S%H935><s%> unto <S%H5704><s%> Jordan, <S%H3383><s%> and the feet <S%H7272><s%> of the priests <S%H3548><s%> that bore <S%H5375><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> were dipped <S%H2881><s%> in the brim <S%H7097><s%> of the water, <S%H4325><s%> (for Jordan <S%H3383><s%> overfloweth <S%H4390><s%> <S%H5921><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> his banks <S%H1415><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the time <S%H3117><s%> of harvest,) <S%H7105><s%>

That the waters <S%H4325><s%> which came down <S%H3381><s%> from above <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4605><s%> stood <S%H5975><s%> and rose up <S%H6965><s%> upon a <S%H259><s%> heap <S%H5067><s%> very <S%H3966><s%> far <S%H7368><s%> from the city <S%H5892><s%> Adam, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H121><s%> that <S%H834><s%> is beside <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6654><s%> Zaretan: <S%H6891><s%> and those that came down <S%H3381><s%> toward <S%H5921><s%> the sea <S%H3220><s%> of the plain, <S%H6160><s%> even the salt <S%H4417><s%> sea, <S%H3220><s%> failed, <S%H8552><s%> and were cut off: <S%H3772><s%> and the people <S%H5971><s%> passed over <S%H5674><s%> right against <S%H5048><s%> Jericho. <S%H3405><s%>

And the priests <S%H3548><s%> that bore <S%H5375><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> stood <S%H5975><s%> firm <S%H3559><s%> on dry ground <S%H2724><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of Jordan, <S%H3383><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the Israelites <S%H3478><s%> passed over <S%H5674><s%> on dry ground, <S%H2724><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> <S%H834><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H1471><s%> were passed <S%H5674><s%> clean <S%H8552><s%> over <S%H5674><s%> <S%H853><s%> Jordan. <S%H3383><s%>
